text: Jonathan Kolia "Jon" Favreau"Jonathan Kolia Favreau". Intellius.com (; born October 19, 1966) is an American movie director, actor, comedian, screenwriter, and voice actor. He appeared in such movies as Elf (in which he was also the director) and Open Season (but got replaced by Matt Taylor for the rest of the series). He is also known for directing Iron Man and The Jungle Book. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stand- up comedians Category:American movie directors Category:American voice actors Category:American screenwriters Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Jon Favreau
